results.title: Total Sales Amount
results.raw_response: Total Sales = SUM(Sales[Net Price])
results.dax: Total Sales = SUM(Sales[Net Price])
results.name: Total Sales
results.expression: SUM(Sales[Net Price])
results.validation_query: EVALUATE ROW("Total Sales", SUM(Sales[Net Price]))

results.title: Handle Missing Data with BLANK
results.raw_response:
Here's the DAX measure for 'Safe Quantity':

```dax
Safe Quantity = IF(ISBLANK(SUM(Sales[Quantity])), 0, SUM(Sales[Quantity]))
```
results.dax: Safe Quantity = IF(ISBLANK(SUM(Sales[Quantity])), 0, SUM(Sales[Quantity]))
results.name: Safe Quantity
results.expression: IF(ISBLANK(SUM(Sales[Quantity])), 0, SUM(Sales[Quantity]))
results.validation_query: EVALUATE ROW("Safe Quantity", IF(ISBLANK(SUM(Sales[Quantity])), 0, SUM(Sales[Quantity])))

results.title: Sales Summary by Category
results.raw_response:
Here's the DAX code for the calculated table:

```dax
Category Summary = 
SUMMARIZE(
    Product,
    Product[Category],
    "Total Sales", SUM(Sales[Net Price])
)
```

SUMMARIZE(
    Product,
    Product[Category],
    "Total Sales", SUM(Sales[Net Price])
)

)

    "Total Sales", SUM(Sales[Net Price])

results.title: Product List with Renamed Columns
results.raw_response: Product Catalog = SELECTCOLUMNS(Product, "Name", Product[Product Name], "Brand", Product[Brand], "Product Category", Product[Category])
results.dax: Product Catalog = SELECTCOLUMNS(Product, "Name", Product[Product Name], "Brand", Product[Brand], "Product Category", Product[Category])
results.name: Product Catalog
results.expression: SELECTCOLUMNS(Product, "Name", Product[Product Name], "Brand", Product[Brand], "Product Category", Product[Category])
results.validation_query: EVALUATE SELECTCOLUMNS(Product, "Name", Product[Product Name], "Brand", Product[Brand], "Product Category", Product[Category])

results.title: Product Percentage of Category Total
results.raw_response:
Here's the DAX code for the calculated column:

```
Category Share % = 
VAR ProductSales = 
    SUMX(
        RELATEDTABLE(Sales),
        Sales[Quantity] * Sales[Unit Price]
    )
VAR CategorySales = 
    CALCULATE(
        SUMX(
            Sales,
            Sales[Quantity] * Sales[Unit Price]
        ),
        ALLEXCEPT(Product, Product[Category])
    )
RETURN
DIVIDE(ProductSales, CategorySales, 0) * 100
```
results.dax:
Category Share % = 
VAR ProductSales = 
    SUMX(
        RELATEDTABLE(Sales),
        Sales[Quantity] * Sales[Unit Price]
    )
VAR CategorySales = 
    CALCULATE(
        SUMX(
            Sales,
            Sales[Quantity] * Sales[Unit Price]
        ),
        ALLEXCEPT(Product, Product[Category])
    )
RETURN
DIVIDE(ProductSales, CategorySales, 0) * 100
results.name: Category Share %
results.expression:
VAR ProductSales = 
    SUMX(
        RELATEDTABLE(Sales),
        Sales[Quantity] * Sales[Unit Price]
    )
VAR CategorySales = 
    CALCULATE(
        SUMX(
            Sales,
            Sales[Quantity] * Sales[Unit Price]
        ),
        ALLEXCEPT(Product, Product[Category])
    )
RETURN
DIVIDE(ProductSales, CategorySales, 0) * 100
results.validation_query:
EVALUATE TOPN(5, ADDCOLUMNS(Sales, "Category Share %", VAR ProductSales = 
    SUMX(
        RELATEDTABLE(Sales),
        Sales[Quantity] * Sales[Unit Price]
    )
VAR CategorySales = 
    CALCULATE(
        SUMX(
            Sales,
            Sales[Quantity] * Sales[Unit Price]
        ),
        ALLEXCEPT(Product, Product[Category])
    )
RETURN
DIVIDE(ProductSales, CategorySales, 0) * 100))

    AVERAGE(Sales[Net Price]),
    SUM(Sales[Net Price])
)

results.validation_query:

    SUM(Sales[Net Price])
))

results.title: Top 5 Products with TOPN
results.raw_response:
Top 5 Sales = 
VAR Top5Products = 
    TOPN(
        5,
        SUMMARIZE(Sales, Product[ProductKey], "TotalSales", SUM(Sales[Net Price])),
        [TotalSales],
        DESC
    )
RETURN
IF(
    SELECTEDVALUE(Product[ProductKey]) IN VALUES(Top5Products[ProductKey]),
    SUM(Sales[Net Price]),
    BLANK()
)
results.dax:
Top 5 Sales = 
VAR Top5Products = 
    TOPN(
        5,
        SUMMARIZE(Sales, Product[ProductKey], "TotalSales", SUM(Sales[Net Price])),
        [TotalSales],
        DESC
    )
RETURN
IF(
    SELECTEDVALUE(Product[ProductKey]) IN VALUES(Top5Products[ProductKey]),
    SUM(Sales[Net Price]),
    BLANK()
)
results.name: Top 5 Sales
results.expression:
VAR Top5Products = 
    TOPN(
        5,
        SUMMARIZE(Sales, Product[ProductKey], "TotalSales", SUM(Sales[Net Price])),
        [TotalSales],
        DESC
    )
RETURN
IF(
    SELECTEDVALUE(Product[ProductKey]) IN VALUES(Top5Products[ProductKey]),
    SUM(Sales[Net Price]),
    BLANK()
)
results.validation_query:
EVALUATE ROW("Top 5 Sales", VAR Top5Products = 
    TOPN(
        5,
        SUMMARIZE(Sales, Product[ProductKey], "TotalSales", SUM(Sales[Net Price])),
        [TotalSales],
        DESC
    )
RETURN
IF(
    SELECTEDVALUE(Product[ProductKey]) IN VALUES(Top5Products[ProductKey]),
    SUM(Sales[Net Price]),
    BLANK()
))

results.title: Safe Ratio with Cascading Fallbacks
results.raw_response:
```
Profit Margin % = 
VAR NetPrice = SELECTEDVALUE(Sales[Net Price], 0)
VAR UnitCost = SELECTEDVALUE(Sales[Unit Cost], 0)
VAR Margin = IF(NetPrice <= 0, 0, (NetPrice - UnitCost) / NetPrice * 100)
RETURN IF(Margin < 0, 0, Margin)
```
results.dax:
Profit Margin % = 
VAR NetPrice = SELECTEDVALUE(Sales[Net Price], 0)
VAR UnitCost = SELECTEDVALUE(Sales[Unit Cost], 0)
VAR Margin = IF(NetPrice <= 0, 0, (NetPrice - UnitCost) / NetPrice * 100)
RETURN IF(Margin < 0, 0, Margin)
results.name: Profit Margin %
results.expression:
VAR NetPrice = SELECTEDVALUE(Sales[Net Price], 0)
VAR UnitCost = SELECTEDVALUE(Sales[Unit Cost], 0)
VAR Margin = IF(NetPrice <= 0, 0, (NetPrice - UnitCost) / NetPrice * 100)
RETURN IF(Margin < 0, 0, Margin)
results.validation_query:
EVALUATE ROW("Profit Margin %", VAR NetPrice = SELECTEDVALUE(Sales[Net Price], 0)
VAR UnitCost = SELECTEDVALUE(Sales[Unit Cost], 0)
VAR Margin = IF(NetPrice <= 0, 0, (NetPrice - UnitCost) / NetPrice * 100)
RETURN IF(Margin < 0, 0, Margin))

results.title: Safe Year-over-Year with Missing Data
results.raw_response:
Safe YoY Change = 
VAR CurrentYearNetPrice = SUM(Sales[Net Price])
VAR PreviousYearNetPrice = CALCULATE(SUM(Sales[Net Price]), SAMEPERIODLASTYEAR('Date'[Date]))
RETURN
IF(
    ISBLANK(PreviousYearNetPrice),
    IF(
        ISBLANK(CurrentYearNetPrice),
        0,
        CurrentYearNetPrice
    ),
    CurrentYearNetPrice - PreviousYearNetPrice
)
results.dax:
Safe YoY Change = 
VAR CurrentYearNetPrice = SUM(Sales[Net Price])
VAR PreviousYearNetPrice = CALCULATE(SUM(Sales[Net Price]), SAMEPERIODLASTYEAR('Date'[Date]))
RETURN
IF(
    ISBLANK(PreviousYearNetPrice),
    IF(
        ISBLANK(CurrentYearNetPrice),
        0,
        CurrentYearNetPrice
    ),
    CurrentYearNetPrice - PreviousYearNetPrice
)
results.name: Safe YoY Change
results.expression:
VAR CurrentYearNetPrice = SUM(Sales[Net Price])
VAR PreviousYearNetPrice = CALCULATE(SUM(Sales[Net Price]), SAMEPERIODLASTYEAR('Date'[Date]))
RETURN
IF(
    ISBLANK(PreviousYearNetPrice),
    IF(
        ISBLANK(CurrentYearNetPrice),
        0,
        CurrentYearNetPrice
    ),
    CurrentYearNetPrice - PreviousYearNetPrice
)
results.validation_query:
EVALUATE ROW("Safe YoY Change", VAR CurrentYearNetPrice = SUM(Sales[Net Price])
VAR PreviousYearNetPrice = CALCULATE(SUM(Sales[Net Price]), SAMEPERIODLASTYEAR('Date'[Date]))
RETURN
IF(
    ISBLANK(PreviousYearNetPrice),
    IF(
        ISBLANK(CurrentYearNetPrice),
        0,
        CurrentYearNetPrice
    ),
    CurrentYearNetPrice - PreviousYearNetPrice
))

results.title: Year-over-Year Growth Percentage
results.raw_response:
YoY Growth % = 
VAR CurrentYearSales = CALCULATE(SUM(Sales[Net Price]), 'Date'[Year] = YEAR(TODAY()))
VAR PreviousYearSales = CALCULATE(SUM(Sales[Net Price]), SAMEPERIODLASTYEAR('Date'[Date]))
RETURN 
    IF(
        PreviousYearSales = 0, 
        BLANK(), 
        DIVIDE(CurrentYearSales - PreviousYearSales, PreviousYearSales)
    )
results.dax:
YoY Growth % = 
VAR CurrentYearSales = CALCULATE(SUM(Sales[Net Price]), 'Date'[Year] = YEAR(TODAY()))
VAR PreviousYearSales = CALCULATE(SUM(Sales[Net Price]), SAMEPERIODLASTYEAR('Date'[Date]))
RETURN 
    IF(
        PreviousYearSales = 0, 
        BLANK(), 
        DIVIDE(CurrentYearSales - PreviousYearSales, PreviousYearSales)
    )
results.name: YoY Growth %
results.expression:
VAR CurrentYearSales = CALCULATE(SUM(Sales[Net Price]), 'Date'[Year] = YEAR(TODAY()))
VAR PreviousYearSales = CALCULATE(SUM(Sales[Net Price]), SAMEPERIODLASTYEAR('Date'[Date]))
RETURN 
    IF(
        PreviousYearSales = 0, 
        BLANK(), 
        DIVIDE(CurrentYearSales - PreviousYearSales, PreviousYearSales)
    )
results.validation_query:
EVALUATE ROW("YoY Growth %", VAR CurrentYearSales = CALCULATE(SUM(Sales[Net Price]), 'Date'[Year] = YEAR(TODAY()))
VAR PreviousYearSales = CALCULATE(SUM(Sales[Net Price]), SAMEPERIODLASTYEAR('Date'[Date]))
RETURN 
    IF(
        PreviousYearSales = 0, 
        BLANK(), 
        DIVIDE(CurrentYearSales - PreviousYearSales, PreviousYearSales)
    ))

results.title: Running Total with CALCULATE and FILTER
results.raw_response:
Running Total =
VAR CurrentDate = MAX('Date'[Date])
VAR CurrentYear = YEAR(CurrentDate)
RETURN
CALCULATE(
    SUM(Sales[Net Price]),
    FILTER(
        ALL('Date'),
        'Date'[Date] <= CurrentDate &&
        YEAR('Date'[Date]) = CurrentYear
    )
)
results.dax:
Running Total =
VAR CurrentDate = MAX('Date'[Date])
VAR CurrentYear = YEAR(CurrentDate)
RETURN
CALCULATE(
    SUM(Sales[Net Price]),
    FILTER(
        ALL('Date'),
        'Date'[Date] <= CurrentDate &&
        YEAR('Date'[Date]) = CurrentYear
    )
)
results.name: Running Total
results.expression:
VAR CurrentDate = MAX('Date'[Date])
VAR CurrentYear = YEAR(CurrentDate)
RETURN
CALCULATE(
    SUM(Sales[Net Price]),
    FILTER(
        ALL('Date'),
        'Date'[Date] <= CurrentDate &&
        YEAR('Date'[Date]) = CurrentYear
    )
)
results.validation_query:
EVALUATE ROW("Running Total", VAR CurrentDate = MAX('Date'[Date])
VAR CurrentYear = YEAR(CurrentDate)
RETURN
CALCULATE(
    SUM(Sales[Net Price]),
    FILTER(
        ALL('Date'),
        'Date'[Date] <= CurrentDate &&
        YEAR('Date'[Date]) = CurrentYear
    )
))

results.title: Union of High-Value Transactions
results.raw_response:
Special Orders = 
UNION(
    SELECTCOLUMNS(
        FILTER(Sales, Sales[Net Price] > 1000),
        "Order Number", Sales[Order Number],
        "Net Price", Sales[Net Price],
        "Quantity", Sales[Quantity]
    ),
    SELECTCOLUMNS(
        FILTER(Sales, Sales[Quantity] > 10),
        "Order Number", Sales[Order Number],
        "Net Price", Sales[Net Price],
        "Quantity", Sales[Quantity]
    )
)
results.dax:
Special Orders = 
UNION(
    SELECTCOLUMNS(
        FILTER(Sales, Sales[Net Price] > 1000),
        "Order Number", Sales[Order Number],
        "Net Price", Sales[Net Price],
        "Quantity", Sales[Quantity]
    ),
    SELECTCOLUMNS(
        FILTER(Sales, Sales[Quantity] > 10),
        "Order Number", Sales[Order Number],
        "Net Price", Sales[Net Price],
        "Quantity", Sales[Quantity]
    )
)
results.name: Special Orders
results.expression:
UNION(
    SELECTCOLUMNS(
        FILTER(Sales, Sales[Net Price] > 1000),
        "Order Number", Sales[Order Number],
        "Net Price", Sales[Net Price],
        "Quantity", Sales[Quantity]
    ),
    SELECTCOLUMNS(
        FILTER(Sales, Sales[Quantity] > 10),
        "Order Number", Sales[Order Number],
        "Net Price", Sales[Net Price],
        "Quantity", Sales[Quantity]
    )
)
results.validation_query:
EVALUATE UNION(
    SELECTCOLUMNS(
        FILTER(Sales, Sales[Net Price] > 1000),
        "Order Number", Sales[Order Number],
        "Net Price", Sales[Net Price],
        "Quantity", Sales[Quantity]
    ),
    SELECTCOLUMNS(
        FILTER(Sales, Sales[Quantity] > 10),
        "Order Number", Sales[Order Number],
        "Net Price", Sales[Net Price],
        "Quantity", Sales[Quantity]
    )
)

results.title: Virtual Relationship with TREATAS

results.title: 3-Month Rolling Average
results.raw_response:
Rolling 3M Avg Sales = 
CALCULATE(
    AVERAGEX(
        DATESINPERIOD('Date'[Date], MAX('Date'[Date]), -3, MONTH),
        SUM(Sales[Net Price])
    ),
    ALL('Date')
)
